Frequent questions and answers

Verified Answers!

Finding answers to our most commonly asked questions is easy. You can browse our FAQs to find what you need. Still can't find what you're looking for? Join our community on Discord, ask your questions and we'll be happy to help.

  • The DX Mentorship is a 3-month program. You will be assigned a mentor who will guide you through the program and help you achieve your goals. You will also have access to our community of mentors and mentees on Discord.
  • You can enroll in the program by filling out the application form. Once you have submitted your application, you will be contacted by our team to schedule an interview. If you are accepted into the program, you will be notified by email.
  • If your application is accepted, the program is free for you. However we offer a paid option for those who want to support the program. The paid option includes a 1-hour consultation with a mentor of your choice to help you with your career goals, guide your journey and answer any questions you may have.
  • Yes you can! We will be accepting applications on a rolling basis. However, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible as we have limited spots available.
  • We use Discord to run the program. Discord is a free platform that allows us to create a community where we can share resources, host events, and connect with each other. We use Zoom to host our weekly program sessions.
  • On the paid path Yes! We have a dedicated team of mentors who will be working with you throughout the program. You will be assigned a mentor who will be your main point of contact. On the free path, you will have the opportunity to connect with other mentees and learn from their experiences.
